title: codereview lets you mail a change without "hg add" the files first
body:
hg change NNNN
add some files
hg mail NNNN

Notice that codereview.appspot.com doesn't include some files.

Whoops!

hg add src/pkg/foo/bar.go
hg mail NNNN


This is something that's probably only a problem because I suck at hg and keep
forgetting the codereview process, but it's also something the tool could probably
double-check.
